I bought this DVD after watching a few minutes of it from a friend and I loved it. The story was actually interesting, the voice actresses were hot, and so were the girls in the movie. If you're into this kind of stuff (I think you know what I mean) then you'll love this DVD.

I ordered this as one of my first hentis and was amused with what i got but for all the wrong reasons.

Im a artist so I have a habit of studding henti-anime I read or watch. So when I saw the overall soullessness in the backdrops and with animation cuts right out of the 80s I had to look at the box to have it only remind me it was made in 05 That's the same year tideless like gunxsword and full metal panic came out. The girls were sweet but flat and the plot jumps off the deep end after the first episode and im pretty sure they forgot to draw the mans hotdog in one shot. after the first seen with the cat girl it was many a comedy trainwreck for me.

If you have a bit of time and some friends you could make it a grate drinking game or a awesome comedy riff.
otherwise don't git your hopes to hi and have fun its worth a look for 2 ok sex sines but the rest is junk.

With its price, poor quality, Soft Core'ness I would recommend it but I have a large collection and I would not start your collection with such a low quality hentai.

If your a Veteran/ Get it just to have it in your collection but don't expect a lot.
